44.lmp: Kàtà yaŋ anà yi yʉ ŋwɛ̀ àtɛ̀r sê. Yi tuuse a neŋ à btoꞌ jɛɛjɛ̀ɛjɛɛ e njep ŋgòŋ na. Bèe a bee reŋ nè meni ŋwɛ̀ yuu ce yi vʉ̀ nè njɛ̀ɛ yaŋ bebep ca kaꞌ. Bèe ce a kweŋger efa yaŋ ca njep ŋgòŋ na bìi, a tɛɛtɛɛ, laŋlaŋ bèe bbʉʉ.
44.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

45.lmp: Kàtà yaŋ anà yi yʉ ŋwɛ̀ àtɛ̀r sê. Yi tuuse a neŋ à btoꞌ jɛɛjɛ̀ɛjɛɛ e njep ŋgòŋ na. Bèe a bee reŋ nè meni ŋwɛ̀ yuu ce yi vʉ̀ nè njɛ̀ɛ yaŋ bebep ca kaꞌ. Bèe ce a kweŋger efa yaŋ ca njep ŋgòŋ na bìi, a tɛɛtɛɛ, laŋlaŋ bèe bbʉʉ.
45.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

46.lmp: Kàtà yaŋ anà yi yʉ ŋwɛ̀ àtɛ̀r sê. Yi tuuse a neŋ à btoꞌ jɛɛjɛ̀ɛjɛɛ e njep ŋgòŋ na. Bèe a bee reŋ nè meni ŋwɛ̀ yuu ce yi vʉ̀ nè njɛ̀ɛ yaŋ bebep ca kaꞌ. Bèe ce a kweŋger efa yaŋ ca njep ŋgòŋ na bìi, a tɛɛtɛɛ, laŋlaŋ bèe bbʉʉ.
46.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

55.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

56.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

57.lmp: Blee bèe, ker ba bèe ce a tʉr byaŋ jɛɛjɛ̀ɛjɛɛ àmbò kosè ryòŋ ker ba byaŋ ce vi ke kòŋ mgwaŋ ba shugà ka nàꞌ, yaŋ ca yi kaꞌ koo woowèe, ba enɛ nlùpnì be ba àgho.
57.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

58.lmp: Blee bèe, ker ba bèe ce a tʉr byaŋ jɛɛjɛ̀ɛjɛɛ àmbò kosè ryòŋ ker ba byaŋ ce vi ke kòŋ mgwaŋ ba shugà ka nàꞌ, yaŋ ca yi kaꞌ koo woowèe, ba enɛ nlùpnì be ba àgho.
58.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

59.lmp: Blee bèe, ker ba bèe ce a tʉr byaŋ jɛɛjɛ̀ɛjɛɛ àmbò kosè ryòŋ ker ba byaŋ ce vi ke kòŋ mgwaŋ ba shugà ka nàꞌ, yaŋ ca yi kaꞌ koo woowèe, ba enɛ nlùpnì be ba àgho.
59.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

70.lmp: Bèe mòꞌ be yuꞌ yap ba àmbò rkàkàr lii yaŋ wowèe, tɛ wèemoꞌ a tʉr yap ba rbʉ̀ʉrtoꞌ. Bèe moꞌ a be yuꞌ a byu yuu kaꞌ, gèe waꞌa, kù tʉr yaŋ ca. Yaŋ ca yii koo bèe moꞌ wowèe a kʉtì ku luŋ à ŋger Nyʉ̀, laŋlaŋ bèe bsii, àmbò Wèmbùm na.
70.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

71.lmp: Bèe mòꞌ be yuꞌ yap ba àmbò rkàkàr lii yaŋ wowèe, tɛ wèemoꞌ a tʉr yap ba rbʉ̀ʉrtoꞌ. Bèe moꞌ a be yuꞌ a byu yuu kaꞌ, gèe waꞌa, kù tʉr yaŋ ca. Yaŋ ca yii koo bèe moꞌ wowèe a kʉtì ku luŋ à ŋger Nyʉ̀, laŋlaŋ bèe bsii, àmbò Wèmbùm na.
71.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

72.lmp: Bèe mòꞌ be yuꞌ yap ba àmbò rkàkàr lii yaŋ wowèe, tɛ wèemoꞌ a tʉr yap ba rbʉ̀ʉrtoꞌ. Bèe moꞌ a be yuꞌ a byu yuu kaꞌ, gèe waꞌa, kù tʉr yaŋ ca. Yaŋ ca yii koo bèe moꞌ wowèe a kʉtì ku luŋ à ŋger Nyʉ̀, laŋlaŋ bèe bsii, àmbò Wèmbùm na.
72.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

77.lmp: Yaŋ anà yi ke lò tuusee ba à njɛ̀ enɛ: Ŋwɛ̀ ce e tʉr yaŋ ca kaꞌ kose kɛ cese ɛ̀, ba enɛ mce ba fashifashì vi be tane ye e kù cùu ba ku mntonto dù ye à mmbò. Mme ka tane waꞌ du ŋwɛ ce e tɛɛ ku yìi ntombì kù cùu, laŋlaŋ kù mntonto, kɛ̀ njep mmèr ɛ̀, ba enɛ ŋgàŋ be koo yaŋ anà foŋ. Wɛ̀ kaꞌ caꞌne ŋwɛ̀ ce e tʉr yaŋ anà ne bo ker lor bo anà joo mo mmer àgho ce wɛ̀ bee suꞌse mbo kaꞌ, kàtà à koo yaŋ ca à tɛ̀r sê.
77.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

78.lmp: Yaŋ anà yi ke lò tuusee ba à njɛ̀ enɛ: Ŋwɛ̀ ce e tʉr yaŋ ca kaꞌ kose kɛ cese ɛ̀, ba enɛ mce ba fashifashì vi be tane ye e kù cùu ba ku mntonto dù ye à mmbò. Mme ka tane waꞌ du ŋwɛ ce e tɛɛ ku yìi ntombì kù cùu, laŋlaŋ kù mntonto, kɛ̀ njep mmèr ɛ̀, ba enɛ ŋgàŋ be koo yaŋ anà foŋ. Wɛ̀ kaꞌ caꞌne ŋwɛ̀ ce e tʉr yaŋ anà ne bo ker lor bo anà joo mo mmer àgho ce wɛ̀ bee suꞌse mbo kaꞌ, kàtà à koo yaŋ ca à tɛ̀r sê.
78.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

79.lmp: Yaŋ anà yi ke lò tuusee ba à njɛ̀ enɛ: Ŋwɛ̀ ce e tʉr yaŋ ca kaꞌ kose kɛ cese ɛ̀, ba enɛ mce ba fashifashì vi be tane ye e kù cùu ba ku mntonto dù ye à mmbò. Mme ka tane waꞌ du ŋwɛ ce e tɛɛ ku yìi ntombì kù cùu, laŋlaŋ kù mntonto, kɛ̀ njep mmèr ɛ̀, ba enɛ ŋgàŋ be koo yaŋ anà foŋ. Wɛ̀ kaꞌ caꞌne ŋwɛ̀ ce e tʉr yaŋ anà ne bo ker lor bo anà joo mo mmer àgho ce wɛ̀ bee suꞌse mbo kaꞌ, kàtà à koo yaŋ ca à tɛ̀r sê.
79.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

88.lmp: Kàtà à fiisè à njɛ̌ nɛ

89.lmp: Kàtà à fiisè à njɛ̌ nɛ

90.lmp: 1. Fa ce jòo mo mmer, laŋlaŋ mntonto, ba cùu nè mmbo kaꞌ.

91.lmp: 1. Fa ce jòo mo mmer, laŋlaŋ mntonto, ba cùu nè mmbo kaꞌ.

92.lmp: 1. Fa ce jòo mo mmer, laŋlaŋ mntonto, ba cùu nè mmbo kaꞌ.

95.lmp: 2. Ce suꞌsi mmbo àfo-àfo nè sàbulu ba mdip mmrara ce me ce sùusùu. Wɛ̌ sùꞌsi wɛɛ, à sor nè yoo bàtàri càꞌcàꞌ.
95.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

96.lmp: 2. Ce suꞌsi mmbo àfo-àfo nè sàbulu ba mdip mmrara ce me ce sùusùu. Wɛ̌ sùꞌsi wɛɛ, à sor nè yoo bàtàri càꞌcàꞌ.
96.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

99.lmp: 3. Fa kèr kose kɛ cese à mmbò kaꞌ. Bʉʉ lo rkoo à njɛ̀ enɛ kaꞌ cese mbǎ.

100.lmp: 3. Fa kèr kose kɛ cese à mmbò kaꞌ. Bʉʉ lo rkoo à njɛ̀ enɛ kaꞌ cese mbǎ.

103.lmp: 4. Laa nyàa tɛ e bi bòŋboŋ tɛ à kaꞌ ye. Fa ce joo mnyàa jɛɛjɛ̀ɛjɛɛ ce sèe à màꞌshi à mndàp nà nè mmbo kaꞌ.
103.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

104.lmp: 4. Laa nyàa tɛ e bi bòŋboŋ tɛ à kaꞌ ye. Fa ce joo mnyàa jɛɛjɛ̀ɛjɛɛ ce sèe à màꞌshi à mndàp nà nè mmbo kaꞌ.
104.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

118.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

119.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

122.lmp: 7. Fa ce tɛɛtee sèe kɛ̀ cuutee ɛ̀, à ma kʉr kaꞌ.

123.lmp: 7. Fa ce tɛɛtee sèe kɛ̀ cuutee ɛ̀, à ma kʉr kaꞌ.

126.lmp: 8. Fa ce jɛ̀r sèe àfo-àfo kaꞌ.

127.lmp: 8. Fa ce jɛ̀r sèe àfo-àfo kaꞌ.

130.lmp: 9. Jàꞌne sèe nsuŋ àmbò yaŋ ca, keꞌ ce cap ba ŋgòŋ kaꞌ.
130.en: 9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.

145.lmp: Ŋwɛ̀ Mbùm wɛɛwɛ à tʉr à lòr nfèꞌ. Tɛꞌshi yoo tu kèr tɛꞌshi bfʉr woo foŋ.
145.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.

146.lmp: Ŋwɛ̀ Mbùm wɛɛwɛ à tʉr à lòr nfèꞌ. Tɛꞌshi yoo tu kèr tɛꞌshi bfʉr woo foŋ.
146.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.
